definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly

sentences.english: Plan down the trair-conk but maintain flexicity.
sentences.chinese: 事前规划，但要维系弹性。

sentences.english: A man should not want to carve out his meat to an ounce before-hand.
sentences.chinese: 一个人也不宜要求事前把一切安排得妥妥贴贴。

sentences.english: Taking preventive action beforehand and remedial action afterwards are the two common methods of warding off taboos.
sentences.chinese: 事前设防和事后补救是禳解禁忌的两种常用的方法。

sentences.english: We will create a mechanism for evaluating key expenditure items before including them in the budget.
sentences.chinese: 构建重大项目支出预算事前评审机制。

sentences.english: Also investigate specific concerns such as flooding zones if you are aware of them beforehand.
sentences.chinese: 如果你事前知道的话，也调查特殊的项目例如水浸区。

sentences.english: Scout Association of Hong Kong reserves the absolute right to alter the price without prior notice.
sentences.chinese: 香港童军总会保留修改价目之权利而毋须事前通知。

sentences.english: After-the-fact education is usually more costly than what is provided before.
sentences.chinese: 事后教育通常会比事前教育付出更大的代价。

sentences.english: Susan knew that Cory was coming because he had phoned her beforehand.
sentences.chinese: 苏珊知道柯瑞会来，因为他事前打了电话给她。

sentences.english: Let us consider the ex ante, in advance of the thinking and plan.
sentences.chinese: 让我们将事前的考虑，换为事前的思考和计划吧。

sentences.english: Let us consider the ex ante, in advance of the thinking and plan.
sentences.chinese: 让我们将事前的考虑，换为事前的思考和计划吧。

sentences.english: Chapter II is about terrorism crisis anticipation in the pre-crisis session.
sentences.chinese: 第二章，恐怖主义危机事前预警。

sentences.english: I tried hard to recollect what I saw just before the accident.
sentences.chinese: 我苦苦追忆着出事前见到的一切。

sentences.english: However, the stock exchange, with legitimate reasons, may apply to the Commission for an extension.
sentences.chinese: 但有正当理由者，事前得向本会申请核准延展之。

sentences.english: And you were unsure that it was offensive beforehand.
sentences.chinese: 而事前你并不清楚这对客户来说是一件忌讳的事。

sentences.english: To give the patient strong heat pulses beforehand.
sentences.chinese: 事前提供病人强的热脉冲。

sentences.english: Advance the idea of just desperate for any horse medicine it.
sentences.chinese: 事前的想法只是死马当活马医吧。

definition: to know the facts/to understand/to be familiar with the situation
to be on guard/wariness/to guard against/preventive
countermeasure for dealing with a situation
to keep sth confidential/to maintain secrecy
